comments.author: casperBGD
comments.body: interesting, will think about taking, not that I follow Bundesliga that much, but like to watch their football, since they play active football, and there are some good clubs there, with Eintracht winning last season Europa leaguehow many participants do you predict in this pool? fees are larger than La Liga and Calcio pools

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: casperBGD on July 19, 2022, 02:05:38 PM‚úÇhow many participants do you predict in this pool? fees are larger than La Liga and Calcio poolsthe more the merrier, of course. we hope to get at least 20 participants. icopress is/will be doing a lot of promotion here in the forum.

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on July 19, 2022, 02:17:59 PMthe more the merrier, of course. we hope to get at least 20 participants. icopress is/will be doing a lot of promotion here in the forum. I will of course invite a few of my friends, but I encourage everyone to do the same!By the way, we have 1 free place for someone who wants to join the pool but is already participating in another Bundesliga pool.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: Thanks for the incentive of another pool.And where the GTD is, at least we should have a base prize + registrations, and incidentally the 4th and 5th places also come from the registrations and then such positions are not guaranteed.50% is fine, but I think that the 4th and 5th place should be guaranteed and in fact put a percentage on it as well.I don't know! I feel that there is distrust and I don't understand it with so many posters in the soccer mega threads, anyway...I repeat well for betnomi that motivates another pool, but I think that to publish in the mega soccer threads you should have at least one pool of experience. ¬† I think that instead of having the minimum entry rule(20), we should have the maximum entry rule, that is, a guaranteed first place that makes you pay the entry fee before the entrys run out.I would sign up if they have a guaranteed prize for the first place, I understand that there is a weekly prize and I want to win every week, but the important "juice" is the ITM in the top 3, so the fifth should have 5% of the total pot and so far they have it at 1x.-Betnomi.com German Bundesliga Football Pool- have guaranteed success with these two reliable users in charge of this pool and betnomi as sponsor, but let's go a GTD (Yes!!) , anyway...success in this pool, I hope to be inside.‚öΩfM‚öΩ

comments.author: CLS63
comments.body: Finally the pool I have been waiting for has been opened. I'm following the Bundesliga closely as I have many people around me who are living in Germany now. I'm going to join the pool on Monday by making the payment. Besides I would like to thank Betnomi for sponsoring the pool as well.

comments.author: darxiaomi
comments.body: Ufff man good to see Betnomi sponsoring this one. I really want to join but i have to think because i want to play all the pools this season (PL, UCL , SERIE A, La LIGA and i also play the F1 pool) so with not spot open in the signatures campaign i still delay my entry in this one. Because i dont want to pay with savings.Anyways hope my comment helps like a bump.

comments.author: 1miau
comments.body: Nice from @icopress and @cygan to have an international Bundesliga giveaway and a big sponsoring from Betnomi. Since we had 2 rounds in our local board, I'm also looking forward to join here and hopefully, we'll see an interesting season. Let's see your bonus tipps, which club will win this year.¬† I'll send my tx soon, of course.¬† Quote from: cygan on July 19, 2022, 02:17:59 PMQuote from: casperBGD on July 19, 2022, 02:05:38 PM‚úÇhow many participants do you predict in this pool? fees are larger than La Liga and Calcio poolsthe more the merrier, of course. we hope to get at least 20 participants. icopress is/will be doing a lot of promotion here in the forum. We'll do some promotion in our German section as well. Or current round from our local section (registration is closing in a few days) is at 15 participants currently (only German participants). Maybe we can get 25+ participants here?

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: Should I play or should I not? I already lost count in how many pools I play. EPL, La Liga, Serie A, UEFA CL, Nations League, F1, probably there will be pool for World Cup too. Probably it's more than monthly wage in poor country.And I barely follow Bundesliga, I just watch some big games. It's not that easy to predict results without knowing teams.But, it would be interesting to try something different than Superbru. And these freebets for week winners looks very attractive.So, I still don't know yet.

comments.author: mole0815
comments.body: Since our wish has been granted and the prediction game takes place on the same platform as the german one, I'm happy to participate.BTC will be transmitted in the next 2-3 days.Thank you cygan + icopress

comments.author: casperBGD
comments.body: Quote from: LTU_btc on July 20, 2022, 01:05:20 AM-snipBut, it would be interesting to try something different than Superbru. And these freebets for week winners looks very attractive.So, I still don't know yet.looking at comments, there will probably be more participants from german local board, and that leads to them beig favorites, since they follow the league much closer than us, from other countrieson the other side, that is a challenge as well, for us to beat them in league that they follow closelynot sure that will take part, dough, could prove to be too may to hold on throughout the season, and I do not want to give up in the middle, will think about that this week

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: LTU_btc on July 20, 2022, 01:05:20 AMShould I play or should I not?‚úÇQuote from: casperBGD on July 20, 2022, 08:07:36 AM‚úÇnot sure that will take part, dough, could prove to be too may to hold on throughout the season, and I do not want to give up in the middle, will think about that this weekwould be nice to see you both here in the prediction pool it's not said that all the german participants here will be at an advantage either (so far not that many have signed up here either)... there are certainly good examples in the other league pools from last season and sometimes the users who don't know much about the league/football give better picks than the users who follow the league weekly

comments.author: Trofo
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on July 20, 2022, 08:47:00 AMand sometimes the users who don't know much about the league/football give better picks than the users who follow the league weekly Definitely not true for myself. I always have best results in sports/leagues I follow most. It is not so bad for pools but when playing actual tickets my ratio of correct picks takes a very serius hit.If the pool was on superbru I would have already joined. As it is on other site, I'll check it out first and then decide. Does it have a usable android app?

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: Trofo on July 20, 2022, 09:20:22 AM‚úÇIf the pool was on superbru I would have already joined. As it is on other site, I'll check it out first and then decide. Does it have a usable android app?the kicktipp app is great. it is available in different languages for android and apple mobile phones

comments.author: Harkorede
comments.body: Quoteüëârules of the poolüëà2 points for the correct tendency (example: predicted 3-0 - result 1-0)3 points for the correct goal difference (example: predicted 2-0 or 1-1 - result 3-1 or 3-3)4 points for the correct result (example: predicted 3-0 - result 3-0)bonus picks: 4 points per correct bonus pickI have a question on the last rule "Bonus picks: 4 points per correct", doesn't that technically means a players gets 8 points per correct pick ? or am I getting it the interpretation wrongly ? as I've never used kicktipp before, but if that's the case I'd definitely not be joining because I'd prefer the idea of someone who can get 10 correct tendency results (10 x 2 = 20 points) to end up with more points than someone with 3 correct results (4 x 3 + 4 x 3 = 24 points).

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Quote from: Harkorede on July 20, 2022, 11:30:09 AMI have a question on the last rule "Bonus picks: 4 points per correct", doesn't that technically means a players gets 8 points per correct pick ? or am I getting it the interpretation wrongly ? as I've never used kicktipp before, but if that's the case I'd definitely not be joining because I'd prefer the idea of someone who can get 10 correct tendency results (10 x 2 = 20 points) to end up with more points than someone with 3 correct results (4 x 3 + 4 x 3 = 24 points).There are seven bonus picks for the whole season which give four points each. So 28 extra points in total at the end of the season. Please see the screenshot attached:Very important: You must submit these tips before the start of the season. Otherwise they will be automatically marked as lost. (Pretty obvious, otherwise you could adjust your picks afterwards).Source: kicktipp.com

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: Harkorede on July 20, 2022, 11:30:09 AMQuoteüëârules of the poolüëà2 points for the correct tendency (example: predicted 3-0 - result 1-0)3 points for the correct goal difference (example: predicted 2-0 or 1-1 - result 3-1 or 3-3)4 points for the correct result (example: predicted 3-0 - result 3-0)bonus picks: 4 points per correct bonus pickI have a question on the last rule "Bonus picks: 4 points per correct", doesn't that technically means a players gets 8 points per correct pick ? ‚úÇthe bonus picks do not refer to the weekly matchdaysthe bonus picks include the following questions:which team will be positioned 16-18?which team will be first to change its manager/coach?which team will produce the highest goal scorer?which team will win the 1. bundesliga?who is going to win the first leg (matchdays 1-17)?and with each correct prediction, the user gets 4 bonus points. of course, these are only awarded when the decision is made. very important for all participants - the bouns picks have to be done before the start of the 1st matchday!edit: bullrun2020bro was faster with the typing
